page.title: 19Local Dialect Around Warsop.
page.content: { Imagine the following conversation {between two Warsop Mums............. "Eh_up m'duck,'ow y'keepin?" "Am o'rate,but our babby's gorra cowd an'dus nowt but cry!" "Cuminoff causey,an'ah'll mash.Mek yersen at'ohm." "Gi_ore messin,our Lee,t'int ahn!" "Liv_im be,yint'ottin;'ere,suppup!" { { Is it a foreign language? Loosely {translated it means................. "Hello,how are you?" "I'm alright but the baby's got a cold.He does nothing but cry!" "Come in off the pavement.I'll make a cup of tea.Make yourself at home." "Stop messing around,Lee,that doesn't belong to us!" "Oh leave him alone,he isn't hurting. Here,drink your tea!"
